# Hello      Markdown

```js
console.log("Hello World"

)
```

```javascript
console.log("Hello World2"

)
```

```ts

function hello(name: string    ) {
                  console.log(name);
};

hello(        "alice");
```

```typescript
function foo(): number {
  return       2;
}
```

```jsonc

{
  // Comment in JSON
  "key":          "value",
                "key2":      
                "value2",
}

```

```json
{
  "numbers":
  ["1",      "2"]
}
```

```yaml

-  item2
```
